title: forgot email
body: forgot the email address for my account so i cant send support tickets so uhh what do i do

replies.body: You should still be able to submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) while signed out by picking "I need help recovering my account" if you're needing help with any account issues. We won't be able to give out the email associated with an account due to privacy reasons, however.
says i must be logged in to submit a ticket
Make sure you're picking the option **"I need help recovering my account"** as I previously mentioned. That will be the option that lets you submit a ticket without being signed in.
